parameters: Yo, are you a fellow of the workers?
I'd like you to help me.
if you need anything, I can help.
I pity those monsters called Pest Birds, see,
so I'd like to keep them if I could.
However, even the dominant Manawraith race
cannot do that under current circumstances.
The workers here won't allow it.
So, could you tell them about me?
That there are Manawraiths like me, see.
Umm... If they're called Pest Birds,
then are they perhaps a nuisance?
I think it's just an official name, though,
since the workers keep calling them that.
It's a terrible name when I think about it.
You don't need to think that much
to know that's a terrible name.
Common harpies are aggressive and dangerous.
But I also know of some who can speak.
I saw one near the dormantories over there.
I'll have you meet up with the Harpy.
If you can convey my intentions to her honestly,
Your manner of speech really gets
on my nerves, for some reason.
\C[17]Pity or Ploy?\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
The Harpy is near the facility to the west.
I'd love to hear her opinion on the matter.
Did you talk to the Harpy?
Yes, well... It seems the Harpy
has no intention to be kept by you.
And why is that, I wonder.
They don't seem to like your attitude.
I'll be frank, you guys are so
bossy that they got pissed at you.
I have a message from the Harpy.
"Go die in a ditch," she says.
Didn't you want to keep that under wraps?
Those words really exude intense anger...
the ones I wished to connect with.
And if so, what will you do?
I must watch my words more carefully.
Though, it is an unconscious decision,
so it'll take time to fix.
As expected of a perfect being.
Yes, because I am a perfect existence,
I'd be real happy if you could point out
what you feel is not perfect.
Manawraiths are neither evil nor arrogant.
They just have a unique way of thinking
Well, I'd still would never become friends
What should be done to change that way of thinking,
Conversations with you are really meaningful.
I'm happy if we could continue working together.
I believe I'm supposed to meet up
Well, if that ain't a boy I see!
For the time being, let's calm them down!
Um, could you listen to me for a moment?
Like how to properly enjoy thigh meat?
I don't intend to talk of such topics.
I'm only here to pass a resident's message.
You talking the machines or the Manawraith?
Ah, that's fine, I don't wanna hear it.
Just tell 'em to go die in a ditch.
A term not befitting the literal
Looks like your relationship is a bit
Actually, did you know what the message
About how they wanna keep us as pets?
Seriously, how do they not realize that
we've been hearing their sorry asses
from the sky all this time?
You know what this means, right?
They think we're such idiots that we
Everyone here really does give off
It's like they're looking down on you
from their high horses or whatever!
...Well, their high horses could never compare
to how high I can fly anyway!
What kind of race is the Manawraith, anyway?
How much do you know about them?
Well, I don't really know much.
I know they call themselves perfect beings
and all, but that's about it...
Also, I think they were a different race before?
I heard about that one too.
I suppose if you recognize yourself
as perfect, you'd become like that, too.
They really are at the height of
It's hard to say without knowing
nor do they seem to lack common sense.
It might be a communication issue.
And you don't really like their guts,
And perhaps, you've been attacked by
the machines who protect this place──
You were even dubbed Pest Birds by them.
Seriously, they took away the sky that
Then perhaps you might be able to
If you could use what we've discussed
You mean to let that scum keep me as a pet?
I'd rather be kept as your pet.
Heck, I'll ask you now. Wanna keep me around?
I can lay lots of eggs, you know.
Wait, eggs aren't to be eaten!
I was just getting fed up with being in the sky
all the time, so won't you take me with you?
I'd love to have you as a companion.
Then a companion I will be!
May I ask for your name?
I think that's a wonderful name.
Now then, I'll be in your care.
Let's go report to the Manawraith.
Go tell 'em to die in a ditch?
That's just how she speaks, after all...
Won't we be to blame if they
end up in a bad mood or something?
If the Manawraiths are as I expected,
then it's probably okay, I hope.
\C[17]Perfect Existence\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
As you pass through this bridge,
you will be under heavy fire.
...or have you already been under heavy fire?
No way, this is too much!
It's so much worse than I imagined!
You might get attacked if you stay here.
I've been through enough of that already!
Apparently my visit is against the rules!
E-even you are treated like that...
What a shame. Even though you're
the one protecting this Star and all.
Well, I'm glad to see they're doing well!
I wish they were a little nicer though!
Young boy! It saddens me to say this,
but the residents will attack you nevertheless!
Please enjoy sightseeing while being careful!
And I hope you don't dislike this place!
